channel.title: Amnesia
channel.description:
Alright, I downloaded Amnesia and having some problems with the game. I've done all the tips and tricks I could think of doing and from other forums, I'm using a [b]Intel(R) HD Graphics Family[/b] card. When I start a new game, the game doesn't show ANYTHING besides the text, and when it FINALLY gets past the text etc., all it shows is a black screen, it shows the hints, the cross-hair etc., but not the screen itself of the game.
Suggestions?

item.title: Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Im pretty sure the game just wont support Intel HD graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’m not sure to what the problem is personally. But my graphics card (its pretty good but its an AMD lol) can’t play this game(forgotten the name of it) for some reason but it can play all other games so it could just be that the creators of the game don’t support it however they’d most likely state that and you’ve probably researched it anyways.
The only thing I can say is research it or ask them yourself o.o. Sorry I couldn’t be of much help lol

Read full topic

item.title: Amnesia
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

someone2:

Well, any game would require a better video card than intel hd. If you’re not going to play games you shouldn’t bother upgrading, but if you do want to you should really upgrade.

Don’t feel like going out and purchasing it. This is the ONLY game so far that has given me this problem.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

someone2:

Lol no. I have an laptop with Intel HD Graphics 4000. It’s newer than yours but it has trouble with counter strike.

Hmmm… alright then, I’m not going to bother upgrading for one game that doesn’t work.

Read full topic
